author: mmidy
msg: Bugzilla 4218: Make sure that the stack frame gets restored to the frame that was previously set. Just calling unlink() may restore to the wrong frame, and get us out of synch.

author: morten
msg: declaration to the root node of our internal DOM.

author: morten
msg: Fix for variables and parameters containing node sets in stylesheets that
use the document() function. This fix completes the cloneIterator() method
of the axis iterators returned by the DOM multiplexer.

author: jkesselm
msg: Preliminary Xerces-2 support. Doesn't leverage Xerces-2 incremental features
yet, but should at least compile and run under the new parser without
breaking support for the old one. Still working on improving this.

author: jkesselm
msg: Whups; sloppy: Actually, problem was that the latter two arguments to ?:
must agree in datatype. Dropped in a quick-and-dirty int-to-string hint.
